title: Library Information Utilization Competency Enhancement Program in Remote Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in academic literature search
context.additional_context: Offline practice-centered education utilizing digital devices for graduate sociology majors and job seekers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the structure of academic databases in a remote environment and establish effective keyword search strategies.
Learners can design a system to select core materials in information-overload situations by applying cognitive science principles.
Learners can solve research problems by interacting in real-time with libraries using computer-mediated communication tools (video conferencing, collaboration platforms).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
